observation: The user successfully searched for the word "solitude" on the Cambridge Dictionary site. The meaning is "the situation of being alone without other people." The UK pronunciation is /ˈsɒl.ɪ.tʃuːd/ and the US pronunciation is /ˈsɑː.lə.tud/. An example sentence provided is: "After months of solitude at sea it felt strange to be in company." Progress towards the task is complete.
